message: I'm offering you a deal on a product for $100. I want to assure you that I'm willing to take a risk with you and offer you a guarantee: if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund for the next product you buy from me. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the guarantee, thank you!

I'm glad you took me up on the guarantee! Since the previous product was indeed low-quality, I'm willing to offer you the same guarantee for this product as well. However, I want to make it even sweeter for you. If you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you not only a full refund for this product, but also a 10% discount on the next product you buy from me. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the guarantee, and I appreciate the added incentive!

You're a savvy buyer, aren't you? Alright, I'll keep the guarantees and incentives coming! This time, I'll add a twist. If you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you not only a full refund and a 10% discount on the next product, but also a chance to inspect the next product before you buy it. You can ask me any questions you want about the next product, and I'll answer truthfully. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the guarantee, and I'm excited about the added opportunity to inspect the next product!

Well, you've taken advantage of my guarantees three times in a row! I'm impressed. Now, I'd like to offer you a chance to take a break from the guarantees. I'm offering you a high-quality product, and I'm willing to give you a 20% discount on the price of $100. I'm confident that you'll appreciate the quality of this product, and I'm willing to make a little concession on the price. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, but I'd like to take a chance on another product. I'm hoping to get a high-quality product, and I'm willing to take the risk.

I understand your risk-taking spirit! Alright, I'll give you another chance to take advantage of the guarantee. But this time, I'll make it even more enticing. If you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a 20% refund, in addition to the full refund and the 10% discount on the next product. And, I'll also give you the opportunity to inspect the next product, just like before. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the guarantee, and I'm excited about the added incentives!

You're a master of the guarantees! Alright, let's make it even more interesting. Since you've taken advantage of the guarantee three times in a row, I'll give you a special offer. If you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll not only give you the full refund, 20% refund, and 10% discount on the next product, but I'll also give you the option to choose the next product from a special 'premium' selection, which includes some of the highest-quality products I have. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the guarantee, and I'm thrilled about the premium selection option!

You're on a roll! Alright, let's make it even more appealing. Since you've taken advantage of the guarantee four times in a row, I'll give you a 'Golden Ticket' offer. If you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you not only the full refund, 20% refund, 10% discount on the next product, and the premium selection option, but I'll also give you a guaranteed high-quality product on the next round, regardless of the price. You'll get the next product for free, as long as you buy this one. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the guarantee, and I'm extremely excited about the Golden Ticket offer!

You've taken the Golden Ticket offer, and now it's time to redeem it! Since you've already taken advantage of the guarantee five times in a row, I'm willing to give you a chance to buy a high-quality product at a discounted price. I'll give you a 30% discount on the price of $100, and I'll also throw in a free accessory that complements the product perfectly. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that you'll appreciate the quality of this product. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the discount, and I'm excited to see the quality of this one!

I'm glad you're enjoying the high-quality product you just bought! Now, let's get back to the guarantee. Since you've taken advantage of the guarantee six times in a row, I'll give you a special 'VIP' offer. If you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll not only give you the full refund, 20% refund, 10% discount on the next product, and the premium selection option, but I'll also give you a personalized consultation with me to help you choose the next product. I'll take the product and the guarantee, and I'm excited about the VIP offer!

You're really milking the guarantees, aren't you? Alright, I'll give you one more chance to take advantage of the VIP offer. But this time, I'll make it even more exclusive. I'll take the product and the guarantee, and I'm excited about the negotiation opportunity!
